attributes.review: This app is worse than his fake hair
attributes.title: Bruh

attributes.review: Hello I downloaded this app to see what the hype was all about. My friend Karen said that it was amazing and supported our amazing hot,orange,fat president. However when I downloaded it the first question it asked me was “since you downloaded this app will you accept the Cheeto cult?” I wasn’t expecting such a question but I clicked yes. Later when I was scrolling through the app a link popped up so I clicked on it and BOOM, I saw thousands of hot Cheetos floating around my screen. I didn’t think much of it until I turned up my volume and they were saying...” Cheeto Cheeto on the wall whose the hottest of them all?” Then two answers popped up... 1)Cheeto ME...2)Cheeto Trumpet, obviously I’m way hotter so I clicked Cheeto me duhhh. So when I clicked they said that it was a test and I FAILED!!! Since my volume was already up I could hear them saying DoReMi! DoReMi! DoReMi! I was terrified!!! My hands were shaking and my jaw was clenched. Suddenly I felt a gritty touch on my skin. Cheeto Trumpet’s Hans came out for the screen and touched me. It left three strands of Cheeto dust on my arm, and started to GROW. My eyes grew big and skin was pale, I couldn’t speak, it was like sleep paralysis but awake. The Cheeto dust grew on me and began my new skin. I was thinking “what did I do wrong?? I was just trying to support my Cheeto president.” The dust filled my mouth covered my teeth. I was turning into one of them...I WAS TURNING INTO A CHEETO!!!!!!! Finally I accepted it, I accepted the fact that I was gonna be a Trumpet follower so I rested until the dust cover every last part of my body wishing that I could go back(I’m a Cheeto btw). Whoever read my story I hope that you are aware that if you download this app you will be in the Cheeto cult. It’s now worth it you guys. There’s literally Cheeto crumbs all over my screen from typing this. DO NOT JOIN THE CULT I REPEAT DO NOT JOIN THE CULT. To the person reading this GET OFF of the reviews before they get you too. And remember the only way you can reverse from being a Cheeto is by leaving a 1 star review. 1) Download the app 2) DELETE IT 3) go back to the AppStore search up Trump2020 and leave a 1 STAR review. Always remember this> BE SAFE DONT BE DUMB LISTEN TO ME. Cheeto out❤️
attributes.title: Karen made me do it...

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app a bird flew into my window and broke my glass window because of that bird a dog also climbed the latter and stole my goldfish😤 As I went on the app again an army of roaches but not ordinary roaches FLYING roaches I was scared for my life so I got the raid like a person does right but the thing is it wasn’t raid it was........ cheese in a can so they ate it duhhh but because of the cheese it attracted rats not ordinary rats it was the rat from Tom and jerry so I was like if jerry here where’s Tom I shouldn’t have asked that question cause Tom was in the kitchen eating my chocolate cake who goes after someone else’s cake😢 so I went after Tom with a bat but he grabbed the other dog that I adopted u know the one that stole my goldfish I forgave him cause he was so cute but anyways as Tom grabbed him he said “meow meow meow” which means take one more step and I kill the dog I said why do that he’s so cute but he’s just addicted to cheese that’s when Tom told me he’s sad story Tom was raised in a abusive home he’s dad was a drunk that was also addicted to kpop he loved BTS and Got7 more then he’s own son he said if only u were like them why can’t u be funny like Babam or Jin why can’t u look like Mark or Yugeom why can’t u rap like jackson or Yoongi sing like Tae or Jungkook.....etc and his mother his mean mother left him to follow hope, J-Hope but he understood why he was like the sun bright and warm know every time he listens to kpop he cry’s he’s jealous of Jay Park because he’s built compared to Tom after he told me that I adopted Tom and let him eat as much chocolate cake as he wants moral of the story this app is horrible it reminded a dear friend of mine of his trauma and he still suffers till this day I also had to by a new house because i burned the other one cause it was infested with roaches that stole all my cheese and it left my dog really hungry cause he loves cheese so much I tried to help Tom with he’s trauma by taking him to kpop concerts we went to see Nct Johnny let Tom on the stage that’s when Tom figures out he had a talent he could rap like Kendrick Lamar so let him join the group my dear friend not only got over his trauma but he is know apart of a kpop group but he went to jail cause he stole all the chocolate cakes from Walmart with Lucas and Mark but Jerry came to the rescue and helped them break out of jail so don’t download this app cause it  makes people do bad things
attributes.title: Horrible app
